ur_rna.StructureEditor.models

Class Motif.Domain

  • java.lang.Object
    • ur_rna.StructureEditor.models.Motif.Segment
      • ur_rna.StructureEditor.models.Motif.Domain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Nuc>, IMotif, INucGroup
    Enclosing class:
    Motif

    public static class Motif.Domain
extends Motif.Segment
implements IMotif
    Represents a segment of an RNA strand that extends from a nucleotide to its pair.

      static Motif.Domain getDomain(Nuc nuc)
      Gets the domain that starts at the specified nucleotide (and ends with its paired nucleotide) or null if the nucleotide is unpaired or is paired with a nucleotide on a different strand.
